title: Nice resort
text: I was pleasantly surprised when I opened the door to my room. I had two bedrooms, a kitchen and a living room. Everything was spotless. I was especially pleased to see a washer and dryer. It was a treat to wake up in the morning to the tune of "Behold the Sea!" by Ralph Vaughan Williams (my alarm) and look out the window at the sea. People were very helpful and it was a pleasant stay in spite of downright cold weather.

title: Acropolis
text: A feeling of being one of the luckiest persons in the world makes the crowds tolerable. There will always be a few crazies that try to take rocks from the cultural treasure, but most people are happy to take turns. Breathtaking sights.

title: Excellent Family Restaurant
text: I had delicious chicken and rice and a house salad I couldn’t finish. Very friendly people and the bathroom was spotless. Wonderful food was the best part. It cost about 13€ when I was here.

title: The Holland Inn
text: The Holland Inn was recommended in a book I purchased about the National Parks. Access to Acadia NP was convenient and staying here was a wonderful experience. The comfortable rooms and excellent food, plus location in town for restaurants made this an ideal trip for us.

title: Good meal
text: I had chicken and pasta and it was delicious. Nice ambience, children welcome but not disruptive. It was medium in cost, and it's easy to find.

title: Delicious Cannoli
text: I liked the cannoli so much I went back again. Cost was SEK 120, which is average. Italian music made feel like I was in Italy. Nice atmosphere for large or small parties.

title: Good Salad
text: I asked them to add chicken to my Italian salad and they were very willing. Originally I ate outside, then moved in because of a downpour. I did not see any children. Very good food for a good price.

title: Great All-around
text: This hostel costs more than the one I stayed at in Jönköping, but the breakfast is good (and extra) and the room is very comfortable. Their is a friendly atmosphere because of the layout at the entrance. There are almost always people in the reception area.

title: Excellent family activity
text: I spent a half day here and was fascinated by the lives of royalty. There were actors in period dress and an activity area for kids. Kids were also wearing period clothes provided by the castle. It was even better with the English tour.

title: Beautiful Church
text: Besides the ornate decorations, this church provided a clarinetist who also sang beautifully. The organ gave me chills, it was so full and beautiful. Everything was done in Swedish, but there was a bulletin that had the English translation.

title: Delicious fish and fries
text: I was pleasantly surprised when I ate lunch here. The fish and chips were delicious. Water is available at the counter, you get your own. The same with hot water and coffee.

title: Good experience
text: The food is good here and reasonably priced. 110 SEK for the daily special. Lovely atmosphere. Family-friendly but not noisy.

title: Costa Rican Ecology
text: Mildred and Jose made me feel like part of the family as we hiked in the mountains and in the tropical rainforest. They took our group to family-owned hotels and restaurants, and I was able to purchase items made by indigenous people. One of the best trips I ever took, even though it included rugged hikes and humid heat. They can arrange your trip based on what you are looking for. We were looking for species, but I hope to go back to learn Spanish and visit the museums. I have lots of wonderful photos but the drag and drop feature is not working below.
place: Travel in Paradise CR Day Tours

title: Wonderful Pasta at Basta
text: The pasta here is delicious - home made. I had garden spaghetti and it included zucchini, mushrooms, tomatoes and a delicious sauce. I cannot eat cheese, so I can't comment about that. The roll was good, too.

title: Good Indian food
text: This restaurant had a very good lunch buffet. The food was spicy but not too spicy, and although I can't remember the names of everything I had, it was delicious.

title: Don't trust Getaroom
text:
room was clean but small, maid forgot to make my bed one day, friendly staff, it was a decent place to use to explore the U.P.
When I got home the hotel had charged me for the room, which I had paid for already. Getaroom said they called, but no refund. I did verify that they had called, but the room price was a hundred dollars cheaper than the getaroom price.

title: Poor Poet finds perfect mug
text: The ceramics were exceptional as well as the service. There were some objects in the lower price range.

title: Magical Place
text: I hope you get to take a class here in your lifetime. There is no other place like it. Beautiful, serene, replenishing.

title: large crowd
text: This place did a fantastic job with a large group of classmates from the Clearing. Delicious food, too
